entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 17 March 2023
